    • Uses of CloseFuture in org.apache.mina.core.session

      Methods in org.apache.mina.core.session that return CloseFuture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloseFuture IoSession.close()
      Deprecated. 
      use IoSession.close(boolean)
      CloseFuture AbstractIoSession.close()
      Closes this session after all queued write requests are flushed.
      CloseFuture IoSession.close(boolean immediately)
      Closes this session immediately or after all queued write requests are flushed.
      CloseFuture AbstractIoSession.close(boolean rightNow)
      Closes this session immediately or after all queued write requests are flushed.
      CloseFuture IoSession.getCloseFuture()
      Returns the CloseFuture of this session.
      CloseFuture AbstractIoSession.getCloseFuture()
      Returns the CloseFuture of this session.
